room_title: Escape room "Shanghaied" by Escapology Denver in Denver
review: The professionalism at this space was wonderful. Everything from our friendly GM (Go Luke!) to the props and puzzles. It was all great. We completed the Shanghaied room in time with a couple clues from Luke. He did a great job giving clues that made us think in a different direction without giving anything away!

room_title: Escape room "Shanghaied" by Escapology Denver in Denver
review: We did the room Shanghaied. We had to escape before our ship left. We found several clues but unfortunately did not succeed. We did have a lot of fun figuring out the clues we did find. We found it very fun and look forward to trying another room.

room_title: Escape room "Shanghaied" by Escapology Denver in Denver
review: We had a great time for my friend's b-day trying to escape Shangheid. Great food, drinks, and games in the lounge area.
